Title: Long Evening Dress with Plunging Neckline

Category: evening, formal-gowns

Featured-image: CR751-black-long-evening-dress-with-plunging-neckline_p.jpg

----

Description: A form fitting gown that is classy and sexy. This plunging V-neck allows for a  high pointed bust line that has a sheer panel. The stunning look of this gown is completed with a sparkling center piece that drips from the neckline, down the bust, and into the waistline. This look is mirrored on the back of the gown. Elegant and sophisticated.
